overview: The New Gaither Growing Series presents the premiere of Lil' Gaither. This feature is filled with lots of fun and fantastic visuals including the wacky antics of the 3 Little Wooden Guys as they sing and dance and an interactive segment entitled 'Find Bullfrog.' Children will be mesmerized while playing peek-a-boo with Bullfrog as he hides in the trees, in the house, and his other favorite spots. Parents and children alike will enjoy the best-loved Homecoming songs by the Gaither Vocal Band and popular kids' songs 'I Am A Promise' and 'I'm Something Special.' Your toddlers and pre-schoolers will watch it again and again! Lil' Gaither is the first of the Gaither Growing Series.
title: Lil' Gaither
